title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 20 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 20 2022
description:
We cannot surrender content platforms to the left. Elon Musk, who Buck says he and Clay often give props to since he's "obviously a genius and a world-class entrepreneur," blames "the woke mind virus" for Netflix's tanking. Is streaming a viable business model? Wimbledon bans Russian and Belarusian players. Buck says, of his favorite sport, that this kind of action is just more of a "broader mind virus that is spreading." Author Heather Mac Donald joins C&B to discuss the rise in crime across the U.S. She points to the Daily Mail headline that Black Lives Matter is blamed for 32% spike in murders of African-Americans in wake of George Floyd’s killing as experts claim protests scared-off cops and worsened crime spiral. Florida Senate creates four new Republican congressional districts and has removed Disney's self-governing power and special exempt status. Clay says, "Whatever you think about Disney today, know that Walt Disney would be rolling over in his grave at the idea of what his company has become."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
